post.text: You don't want to miss this one: Join Hillary, President Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama, President Bill Clinton, and Chelsea Clinton live in Philly on the eve of Election Day.

comment.author: Colton
comment.text: Haters be gone! Women should rule the world and we will be much better off. I am so with Hillary because of her amazing qualifications better than any past candidate. She's been working for bettering the lives of others for decades!

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Wow - this comment truly sums up the mentality of so many supporters - voting Hillary because she's a woman..Obama because he's black. Please don't suggest there's more to it - I have yet to read an intelligible response evidencing this candidate.

replies.author: Colton
replies.text: Did you even read the second half of my post? She's not just a woman.
